description.@en: Snooping, cheating and stealing are my most valuable assets.

data.notes:
Lawbreaker Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically oath breakers or on the run from something or someone. They deal in lies, steal from the unwary and rabble-rouse to earn their keep, and with nothing to lose, they have little to fear.

effect.@en: Any Skill Rank you gain in Eavesdrop, Guile and Skulduggery modify your Base Chance by +15, instead of +10.
